schema.description: 云消息队列 MQTT 版实例的ID，一定要和客户端实际使用的实例ID匹配。该实例ID在[控制台](https://mqtt.console.aliyun.com/)**实例详情**页面获取。

RequestId.description: 公共参数，每个请求的ID都是唯一的。

400.errorMessage: An error occurred while checking the account information by the STS token.
An error occurred while validating the permissions of the instance. Please verify the account that created the instance and its permissions settings.
An error occurred while validating the parameters. The parameters may be missing or invalid.
An error occurred while validating the resource permissions. Please check the account that created the instance, topic, and GroupId, and check their permission settings.
You have revoked tokens too many times. Please try again later.
An error occurred while validating the parameter. The parameter may be missing or invalid.

404.errorMessage: The specified API is not supported.

500.errorMessage: An error occurred while processing your request. Try again later.
An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.

title: 吊销 Token
description:
- 单用户请求频率限制为5次/秒。请联系云消息队列 MQTT 版技术支持，钉钉群号：35228338。
- 每成功调用一次**RevokeToken**接口，都会计算为一次消息TPS，从而影响您的计费。计费详情，请参见[计费说明](~~52819~~)。
